contents: palimpsest: the remains of 6 lines of writing  belonging to an account in Coptic are still visible; this document was partially erased to make room for part of the list of the martyrs of Sebastia (only the first 8 names remain, but the list does not seem to have been much longer)
propernames: Domêtianos [Dometianos]; Oualês; Hêsychios; Ailianos [Hêlianos]; Smaragdos; Sisinnios; Seuêrianos; Philoktêmôn
frontback: remains of two lines belonging to an account in Coptic.
statepreservation: palimpsest ostracon (8.5 x 7 cm) broken to the right and at the bottom containing 8 lines of writing arranged in a single column (4.1 cm maximum width), centered on the surface, on which a document had been previously written and was subsequently erased on the area where the list now appears. Upper margin is practically non-existent and lower margin has been lost. Left-hand margin is 2.6 cm at its widest, and the right-hand one ranges between 2.1 cm and 3 cm
lectionalsigns: Cross at the beginning of text, on the left-hand margin
